info.name: Old tumblr (in repairs as of 27/03/20)
info.description: Return tumblr to the old colours
info.additionalInfo:
Works on all tumblr pages, including new post popup and dashboard sideblog bar

Works on all of tumblr colours, not just the background but also the buttons, icons, texts, etc etc

EDIT: Tumblr changed their entire css code again, so this stopped working
I will need a bit of time to update it, because I need to find what each line does again
Blame tumblr being shit

Edit: partly repaired, but I probably missed some things here and there
Also Stylish won't let me update the damn thing, throw error at me, so here
https://pastebin.com/XjXfxiqJ
Copy and paste the update to replace the code, or create a new file and paste that in and you'll be good to go
